exception.name: Independent Module Linking exception
exception.notes: The main part of this exception is essentially the same as Classpath-exception-2.0. However, due to it being used with LGPL and a different lead-in that Classpath-exception-2.0, it has its own id.

If you do not wish to do so, delete this exception statement from your version.
